verses.name: Joshua 21:17
verses.text: And out of the tribe of Benjamin, Gibeon with her suburbs, Geba with her suburbs,

verses.name: Joshua 21:18
verses.text: Anathoth with her suburbs, and Almon with her suburbs; four cities.

verses.name: Joshua 21:19
verses.text: All the cities of the children of Aaron, the priests, were thirteen cities with their suburbs.

verses.name: Joshua 21:20
verses.text: And the families of the children of Kohath, the Levites which remained of the children of Kohath, even they had the cities of their lot out of the tribe of Ephraim.

verses.name: Joshua 21:21
verses.text: For they gave them Shechem with her suburbs in mount Ephraim, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Gezer with her suburbs,
